full_title_en: European System for Cardiac Operative Risk Evaluation (EuroSCORE) II
medium_description_en: Predicts risk of in-hospital mortality after major cardiac surgery.
short_description_en: In-hospital mortality after major cardiac surgery.

seo.meta_description_en: The European System for Cardiac Operative Risk Evaluation (EuroSCORE) II predicts risk of in-hospital mortality after cardiac surgery.
seo.keywords_en: In-hospital mortality, in hospital, euroscore, euroscore 2, euroscore ii, cardiac surgery, cardiac surgical mortality

how_to_use.use_case_en: Do you use the EuroSCORE II and want to contribute your expertise? Join our contributor team!

next_steps.advice_en: Do you use the EuroSCORE II and want to contribute your expertise? Join our contributor team!

about.formula_en:
Predicted mortality = ey / (1 + ey)

Where y = -5.324537 + ∑ βixi

creator_info.about_en: Samer A. M. Nashef, MB ChB, FRCS, PhD, is a cardiothoracic surgeon at the Papworth Hospital in Cambridge, UK. Dr. Nashef’s primary research is focused on atrial fibrillation and risk stratification in cardiac surgery.
